meanings.sent1: The chauffer arrived promptly to drive the family to the airport.
meanings.sent2: The wealthy businessman always hires a chauffer to take him to important meetings.
meanings.sent3: The chauffer accidentally took the wrong turn and ended up at the zoo instead of the museum.
meanings.sent4: She navigated the busy city streets like a skilled chauffer, smoothly guiding the car through traffic.
meanings.sent5: The chauffer's uniform was crisp and professional, adding to the luxurious experience.

meanings.definition: To drive a car as a chauffeur.
meanings.sent1: I will chauffer the guests to the wedding venue in style.
